alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 10:31AM CDT until April 03 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Western Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1031 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fort Rucker to near Enterprise to 6 miles north of Samson, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Dothan, Geneva, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Enterprise, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Slocomb, Samson, Newton, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee, Grimes and Napier Field. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
